snippet: The company said Wednesday that it had a total of 59.6 million paid streaming members during the quarter, a net addition of 4.9 million.
abstract: Netflix reports total revenues in first quarter of $1.6 billion, up 24 percent from period year earlier, and says it has total of 59.6 million paid streaming members, compared with 46.1 million in period year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The company said Wednesday that it had a total of 59.6 million paid streaming members during the quarter, a net addition of 4.9 million.

headline.main: Though Profits Fall, Netflix Shares Surge on Subscriber Growth
headline.print_headline: Though Profits Fall, Netflix Stock Surges on Subscriber Growth
